DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety dalteparin compare unfractionated heparin patient non ST elevation acute coronary syndrome plan undergo coronary intervention ( angioplasty bypass surgery )
DOC.brief_title: Dalteparin Versus Unfractionated Heparin In Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The study prematurely discontinue November 30 , 2008 due delay meet pre-defined protocol recruitment milestone . There safety concern regard study decision terminate trial .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year Ischemic pain 10 minute within 24 hour enrollment At least two follow three risk factor : Age 60 year ( 50 case diabetic ) , Raised cardiac enzyme level , abnormal ECG finding Contraindications use anticoagulant Active bleed abnormal coagulation test Ischemic stroke within last 6 month hemorrhagic stroke Lumbar spinal puncture within last 48 hour S creatinine level 2
DOC.keyword: Non-ST Elevation Acute Coronary Syndromes coronary intervention
